message.body: ￼I did this before I met you!
Ha. I like it.
Well I think it is a reminder that I can make it through DMI and succeed
of course. the best thing about DMI is that is reminds you how tough you really can be.
you will even surprise yourself.
Oh I bet I already surprised myself
I just get nervous everybody is so amazing
I want to go to there - Tina fey
people come in with experience, but i feel like all of that gets thrown out the window at a certain point. everyone gets a fresh start. and it's really what you make of your time in the program.
Yes how do I make it the best for me possible is a hard question though. But I am Working on finding some answers
just keep that attitude and it will happen.
yes. see if you can do an independent study.
Ok should I stalk down gunta and ask her to be my spiritual advisor through second semester
Ok but the question is in what? I have only heard tell of her greatness. What's she great at?
Listening. Everyone is so quick to solve problems and have the answer. She is one of the few that is willing to let the answers come to her.
Ohhhhhh nice she should help me with my anxiety
She is good at helping you figure yourself out. But I have to admit there are always many more questions that follow with her.
Did u do independent study with her?
Yes. Second semester. And she was my thesis advisor.
Hey, I have to be up early for a meeting. Lets continue this conversation tomorrow. Must sleep now'ish.
What you need to so is come up with an area of study you are interested and maybe a project idea and present it to her. Then she will know how she can help you.
Goodnight.
What was your independent study on?
Oh bye good night sleep well
